official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that financial institutions should cooperate with the economic recovery plan of the Federal Government by following the lead of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System in setting lower interest rates for consumer loans.

summary.text: Declares that it is the sense of Congress that financial institutions should cooperate with the economic recovery plan of the Government by following the lead of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System in setting lower interest rates for consumer loans.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that financial institutions should cooperate with the economic recovery plan of the Federal Government by following the lead of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System in setting lower interest rates for consumer loans.
